fields_of_interest: Energy, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: GNE Finance is promoting EuroPACE (on-tax financing tool aimed to increase investment in energy efficiency in buildings), thus the company is inclined to support and promote policies that assist in the implementation of EuroPACE. In this regard, GNE Finance is interested in following up with the policy developments related to Energy Performance in Buildings Directive, Energy Efficiency Directive, Capital Markets Union and the whole Winter Package that unites a broad array of initiatives that are in line with financing deep energy retrofits in buildings.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: GNE Finance is currently a member of SmartEN (http://www.smarten.eu/), a Brussels-based association of market players driving digital and decentralised energy solutions.
relevant_communication: GNE Finance is part of an H2020 Consortium which project will start from March 01st 2018 and will dedicate relevant resources to communicate and interact with stakeholders involved in the energy efficiency investment arena. As such, for instance, GNE Finance will participate as Speaker at the next Covenant of Mayors and Energy Efficiency Market Place scheduled for February 21st in Brussels.
goals__remit:
GNE Finance (Global New Energy Finance) is an Advisory and Investment Manager for Sustainable Infrastructure and Climate-Aligned Projects that brings the expertise, track-record and network to promote, structure, and finance clean energy projects. 
GNE Finance is leading the development of EuroPACE financing platform under the auspices of the Horizon 2020 project, EuroPACE, awarded in 2018 under a grant agreement No 785057.
